document.title: Grouping Digits As a Method For Increasing Computation Speed Of Galois Field Arithmetic For Erasure Coding Applications
document.abstract: The performance of multiplications in Galois Field arithmetic using the GROUP method is measured, described, and analyzed using the GF Complete open-source library. Galois Field arithmetic is vital for many erasure coding methods, including Reed-Solomon coding, and the GROUP method is a simple and modular technique for increasing computation speed.
